skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.IncreaseResourceProduction
skill.description: For an agent to move toward a resource node and increase its production with a specified quantity. Once the resource node is reached, production start. If the resource node is localized in a non accessible urban block, agent stays outside the urban block and activate the production anyway. Because produce resource for a node requires the presence of the agent, action can only be done on one resource node.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to enact on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quatity of resource that will be added to the node production.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: increaseProduction
link.description: To enact the decision to "increase" the production of the issued node.

feedback.name: producing
feedback.description: Sent once the agent is producing the issued quantity of resource in the resource node.
